title: Danielle Lloyd targeted by sick online trolls for Beyonce-inspired pregnancy announcement
text:
Danielle Lloyd targeted by sick online trolls for Beyonce-inspired pregnancy announcement She's hoping for a girl this time Share Comments By Vicki Newman 12:12, 14 FEB 2017 Updated 12:33, 14 FEB 2017 Celebs Danielle Lloyd has been targeted by trolls for her Beyonce-inspired pregnancy announcement (Photo: Instagram/OK! Magazine) Danielle Lloyd took inspiration from Queen Bey as she announced her pregnancy to the world.
But the former Miss England, who already has three boys with ex-husband Jamie O'Hara , has been targeted by mean online trolls over her photo shoot.
The 33-year-old announced her pregnancy on the front cover of OK! magazine as she recreated the famous picture Beyonce used to announce she is expecting twins.
The singing superstar took to Instagram to post the image of herself in a pair of blue knickers and a plum bra, with a veil on her head and surrounded by flowers.
Read More Beyonce is pregnant with TWINS as she and Jay Z confirm happy news with baby bump selfie Danielle is expecting a baby with her fiancé Michael O'Neill She used the image to announce that she was expecting twins with husband Jay Z.
Inspired by the powerful image, Danielle made her own version in order to let people know that baby number four - her first with fiancé Michael O'Neill - is on the way.
But the former WAG became the target of sick online trolls for the photoshoot.
Danielle, who says she's hoping for a girl this time, posted the magazine cover on Instagram, saying: "So it's official Am expecting a baby. I loved this Beyoncé inspired shoot with @ok_mag #pregnant #baby#excited"
How Beyonce announce her pregnancy (Photo: Instagram/beyonce) Danielle's version of the picture (Photo: OK! Magazine) And some responded in a very negative way.
Quote: : "How is this inspired??? U copied the whole damn look!!! The public does not care for u or ur child, it's no wonder u did this to be relevant!!!! Wow can't even come up with ur own style had to copy it!!!! What a joke!!! I'd feel embarrassed if I was u" [sic]
Another said: ""Inspired"? You mean copied to the T, right?"
"Good job copying Beyoncé. Sucks you can't have your own originality. Copying someone is the highest form of appreciation though I guess lol," wrote another.
However, there were some loyal fans who jumped to her defence and offered her their congratulations.

Everyone really needs to get back to their lifes. She didn't steal and say it was her own, clearly the photographer picks the shoot and anyway she's clearly credited beyonce. It's nothing to do with race. Racism does exist, but taking a picture like someone else did to announce a pregnancy is not racism in the slightest. Calling a pregnant woman viscous and disgusting names because she took a picture makes you the ignorant person. Stupid people make my head hurt!" [sic]
"Great news! Congratulations Danielle, you deserve to be happy," commented another fan.
And another said: "What a vile bunch of trolls! I'll never understand why people feel the need to follow let alone comment of people's photos if they don't like them?! To much time on their hands congratulations on the new baby" [sic]
Mirror Celeb has contacted Danielle's representatives for comment.
